edgerouter.desc: In drop-in gateway mode, the router will use ARP spoofing to let clients on the LAN to use it as the gateway. For details, please view $$$$ Drop-in Gateway Topology $$$$. You can use this mode to extend the functionality of your primary route.
edgerouter.cookies_dns_label: Force the use of Drop-In Gateway Mode DNS
edgerouter.cookies_dns_tips: This option forces the use of The Drop-in Gateway Mode DNS when on and the primary router DNS when off.
edgerouter.no_active_tips: This device has never been connected, please check the device status.
edgerouter.remove_device_caution: Whether to delete the covered current device
edgerouter.scan_device_warning: You need to use an Ethernet connection to the primary route in order to use drop-in gateway mode.
edgerouter.dhcp_on_tips: 上级路由已开启DHCP，为避免网络冲突请点击$$$$跳转至上级路由$$$$
